definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)

sentences.english: Later, these figures may be compared with the same sites, when the diluted Gentian Violet is irrigated.
sentences.chinese: 其後以稀釋之龍膽紫灌注之，再於相同位置比較之。

sentences.english: Tongue ulcer Department gentian violet can be coated after a few days to heal on its own.
sentences.chinese: 舌部潰瘍處可塗布龍膽紫，幾天後即可自行癒合。

sentences.english: In the experiment class, the teacher let us dye using gentian violet.
sentences.chinese: 實驗課上，老師讓用龍膽紫進行染色。
